name: HuggingFaceTB/finemath
description: FineMath, a comprehensive dataset from HuggingFaceTB, is built upon mathematical content mined from CommonCrawl. With two variations boasting 34B and 54B tokens, respectively, the dataset is focussed on clear and detailed explanations in mathematical education through the application of a dedicated mathematical content classifier. This dataset is an essential resource for individuals seeking to learn mathematics progressively and understand concepts through step-by-step problem-solving.
citeAs: @misc{allal2025smollm2smolgoesbig,       title={SmolLM2: When Smol Goes Big -- Data-Centric Training of a Small Language Model},        author={Loubna Ben Allal and Anton Lozhkov and Elie Bakouch and Gabriel Martín Blázquez and Guilherme Penedo and Lewis Tunstall and Andrés Marafioti and Hynek Kydlíček and Agustín Piqueres Lajarín and Vaibhav Srivastav and Joshua Lochner and Caleb Fahlgren and Xuan-Son Nguyen and Clémentine Fourrier and Ben Burtenshaw and Hugo Larcher and Haojun Zhao and Cyril Zakka and Mathieu Morlon and Colin Raffel and Leandro von Werra and Thomas Wolf},       year={2025},       eprint={2502.02737},       archivePrefix={arXiv},       primaryClass={cs.CL},       url={https://arxiv.org/abs/2502.02737},  }
creator: HuggingFaceTB
keywords: Text Mining, Mathematical Education, CommonCrawl, Mathematical Content Classification
